author: void.xyz
content:
I have a question meant for the core developers, or those who are intimately familiar with Ethereum protocol development. How long did it take you to acquire the knowledge/skill set you have today? 

I find myself wanting to dive even deeper into Ethereum beyond smart contracts and even perhaps even be competent enough to contribute to core development one day. A quick glance through the Ethereum Research forum, Github repos and this Discord channel shows the heavy theoretical basis that Ethereum is built on. I understand that this project is ever-evolving and constantly changing, to the point where it seems like a race to keep up with its rapid development, but I still want to be involved ğŸ™‚

I feel like the answer is to just stick around and learn as I go. Any other direction or guidance would be greatly appreciated!

author: sky.cactus
content: Pick a very narrow area that piques your interest and focus on learning that rather than trying to learn everything.
